__INSTRUCTIONS__: This is a template for creating new student profiles. Remove this instruction field before using.
__id_note__: ID must be lowercase with hyphens (e.g., john-doe). This will be used in the URL.
__email_note__: Must be a valid email address
__photo_note__: Path to student photo. Image should be at least 400x400px
__graduationYear_note__: Optional field. Must be a number
bio: Write a compelling bio here (50-500 characters). This is a required field that describes the student's background, interests, and skills. Make it engaging and informative.
personalStatement: Optional longer statement about your journey, goals, and aspirations (up to 1000 characters). This appears prominently on your profile page.
__contact_note__: All contact fields are optional but must be valid URLs if provided
__skills_note__: Required: at least one skill. Add more as needed
careerGoals: Brief statement about your career goals (up to 300 characters)

semesters.name: Fall 2024
semesters.__dates_note__: Dates must be in ISO 8601 format. endDate is optional

projects.title: Your Project Title Here
projects.description: Detailed project description explaining what it does, the problem it solves, and key features. Must be at least 50 characters and no more than 500 characters.
projects.__demoUrl_note__: Optional: Must be valid URL if provided
projects.__repoUrl_note__: Optional: Must be valid URL if provided
projects.__semester_note__: Required: Should match parent semester name
projects.__featured_note__: Optional: boolean, defaults to false. Featured projects appear on homepage
projects.__canEmbed_note__: Optional: boolean, defaults to true. If true and demoUrl provided, shows iframe preview

semesters.__projects_note__: Required: Each semester must have 1-6 projects
